lead_paragraph: The grocery chain Whole Foods is cutting about 1,500 jobs, or about 1.6 percent of its work force, in the next eight weeks in a move to lower prices and keep up with competition.

headline.main: Whole Foods to Eliminate 1,500 Jobs in Price-Cut Move
headline.print_headline: Whole Foods To Eliminate 1,500 Jobs In Price-Cut Move

snippet: The grocery chain Whole Foods is cutting about 1,500 jobs, or about 1.6 percent of its work force, in the next eight weeks in a move to lower prices and keep up with competition.
